oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show - Series 2, Program 01
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Series 2, program 1 of a radio show hosted by Hank Thompson with his Brazos Valley Boys (including steel guitarist Lefty Nason, fiddler Wade Wood, and singer Billy Stewart), to promote Hank's songbook of his Capitol recordings (songbook commercials not included). Recording begins with an abandoned take. Circa 1949.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson; Brazos Valley Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Cousin Abner) -- Theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart) -- Opening statement (Hank Thompson) -- You Broke My Heart (In Little Bitty Pieces) (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Opening statement (Cousin Abner) -- Theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart) -- Opening statement (Hank Thompson) -- You Broke My Heart (In Little Bitty Pieces) (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Ragtime Annie (Wade Wood fiddle, Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson talks -- The Grass Looks Greener Over Yonder (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson talks -- I Love You Because (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Georgia Steel (Lefty Nason steel guitar, Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson talks -- Waiting For My Call To Glory (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Closing statement (Hank Thompson) -- Theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thompson, Hank; Brazos Valley Boys; Wood, Wade; Nason, Lefty
